title: Crucial to the emergence of the first cities

content.question: All of the following were crucial to the emergence of the first cities EXCEPT

choices.label: a system for food storage and distribution
separation of the ruling system and the religious system

content.answer: separation of the ruling system and the religious system

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

topic.text: 6.1: The Origin and Influences of Urbanization

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe spatial patterns, networks, and relationships.
